original_text: But if some of the branches were broken off, and you, although a wild olive shoot, were grafted in among the others and now share in the nourishing root of the olive tree,
korean_text: 또한 가지 얼마가 꺾이었는데 돌감람나무인 네가 그들 중에 접붙임이 되어 참감람나무 뿌리의 진액을 함께 받는 자가 되었은즉

sentences.original_text: But if some of the branches were broken off,
and you, although a wild olive shoot,
were grafted in among the others
and now share in the nourishing root
sentences.korean_translation: 이제는 그 양육하는 뿌리를 함께 받으며
